p: The main goal of this review is to present the latest research on both the chemistry and new findings on the biological activity of A. dracunculus, proven by professional research. Earlier reviews by Aglarova et al. and Obolskiy et al. ( Aglarova et al., 2008; Obolskiy et al., 2011) are quite generalized and donâ€™t contain the latest, detailed information on this species, which is valuable in relation to pharmacology, cosmetology and food industries. In addition, the paper encompasses all previously known information concerning its biology and chemistry as well as the traditional medicine and culinary applications of the species under consideration.
